name: SchadowIt
description:
I need your help, player...

Play as Schadow in a dark place where all the souls rest in peace after death
But Schadow doesn't want to stay there, with you, with anyone else...

Arrows to move and Mouse to grab things... this is a simple place

This game haves a lot of spoilers to DragItCube

thanks for the DragItCube community for being amazing with me! bye fellas
